# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.13.0)
project(reaimgui-custom LANGUAGES C CXX ASM)

# target
add_library(reaimgui-custom STATIC "")
set_target_properties(reaimgui-custom PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "reaimgui-custom")
set_target_properties(reaimgui-custom PROPERTIES ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "build/windows/x64/release")
target_include_directories(reaimgui-custom PRIVATE
    ../reaimgui/vendor
)
target_include_directories(reaimgui-custom PRIVATE
    C:/Users/rayga/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/b/boost/1.75.0/20e15469b6ae4d32afa35bcad81610ef/include
    C:/Users/rayga/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/i/imgui/v1.81/b4956e216dc5424f96bc383bc2a0b8ce/include
)
target_compile_definitions(reaimgui-custom PRIVATE
    BOOST_ALL_NO_LIB
)
set_property(TARGET reaimgui-custom PROPERTY C_STANDARD 99)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(reaimgui-custom PRIVATE $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-TP>)
endif()
target_compile_options(reaimgui-custom PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/EHsc>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/EHsc>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/EHsc>
)
target_compile_features(reaimgui-custom PRIVATE c_std_99)
target_compile_features(reaimgui-custom PRIVATE cxx_std_17)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(reaimgui-custom PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(reaimgui-custom PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
target_link_libraries(reaimgui-custom PRIVATE
    libboost_filesystem-mt-s
    imgui
)
target_link_directories(reaimgui-custom PRIVATE
    C:/Users/rayga/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/b/boost/1.75.0/20e15469b6ae4d32afa35bcad81610ef/lib
    C:/Users/rayga/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/i/imgui/v1.81/b4956e216dc5424f96bc383bc2a0b8ce/lib
)
target_sources(reaimgui-custom PRIVATE
    src/main.cpp
)
